name: SCP: Containment Breach HD Remake Remake
name_original: SCP: Containment Breach HD Remake Remake
description: I am attempting to recreate SCP: Containment Breach HD Edition by changing some graphics and lighting and stuff. I also use music from other SCP games such as SCP:SL, SCP rBreach, SCP Unity, and the original SCP Containment breach Game. May be very buggy or some things may not work because this game is still in development.
